suncertify.db
Class LockManager

java.lang.Object
  suncertify.db.LockManager
public class LockManager
extends java.lang.Object

Singleton helper class used from the Data class to manage the locking logic. A virtual lock is set on a record number. Virtual locks are saved in a HashMap instance where the key is an Integer (record number) and the value is the Data instance which is holding the lock.

Method Summary
 void cleanUp()
          Cleans up the lock manager, called just before shutdown
static LockManager getInstance()
          Retrieves the singleton instance of LockManager

          Removes locks from a given object (Data instance)
